verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:38
verses.text: And Obed begat Jehu, and Jehu begat Azariah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:39
verses.text: And Azariah begat Helez, and Helez begat Eleasah,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:40
verses.text: And Eleasah begat Sisamai, and Sisamai begat Shallum,

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:41
verses.text: And Shallum begat Jekamiah, and Jekamiah begat Elishama.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:42
verses.text: Now the sons of Caleb the brother of Jerahmeel were, Mesha his firstborn, which was the father of Ziph; and the sons of Mareshah the father of Hebron.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:43
verses.text: And the sons of Hebron; Korah, and Tappuah, and Rekem, and Shema.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:44
verses.text: And Shema begat Raham, the father of Jorkoam: and Rekem begat Shammai.

verses.name: 1 Chronicles 2:45
verses.text: And the son of Shammai was Maon: and Maon was the father of Beth–zur.
